items.title: Analysts call for big declines in Palantir despite solid earnings; Goldman sees more than 25% drop
items.description: The firm reported in-line earnings and topped revenue estimates in the first quarter.

items.title: Buy this e-commerce stock that can navigate tariffs and has more than 20% upside, says BMO
items.description: BMO initiated the stock with an outperform rating and a $120 per share price target.

items.title: This group of stocks offers a ‘trade war shield,’ says BCA Research
items.description: Cybersecurity stocks, being a primarily service-based industry, could offer investors a hedge against tariff volatility.

items.title: Don't count former JPMorgan strategist Kolanovic as part of the Palantir 'growth cult'
